body_html:
Bazel had quite a few backwards incompatible changes this year, so the error is definitely due to using an incompatible bazel version. You have two options:

  • Use a new branch as @reedwm suggested
  • Or use the appropriate bazel version, as listed at the bottom of this page:
    https://github.com/tensorflow/tensorflow/blob/master/tensorflow/docs_src/install/install_sources.md
body_text:
Bazel had quite a few backwards incompatible changes this year, so the error is definitely due to using an incompatible bazel version. You have two options:

Use a new branch as @reedwm suggested
Or use the appropriate bazel version, as listed at the bottom of this page:
https://github.com/tensorflow/tensorflow/blob/master/tensorflow/docs_src/install/install_sources.md
body:
Bazel had quite a few backwards incompatible changes this year, so the error is definitely due to using an incompatible bazel version. You have two options:
- Use a new branch as @reedwm suggested
- Or use the appropriate bazel version, as listed at the bottom of this page: 
https://github.com/tensorflow/tensorflow/blob/master/tensorflow/docs_src/install/install_sources.md
